title: Is it possible to make a bot for Ruqqus?

body: If you mean like twitter/discord bots you can copy and trim their methods as they are generic. You'd need to have it manually refresh pages then spider to read for !actions until ruqqus implements socket connections or supplies feeds that your bot can refresh and read for guilds and/or threads.
body_html: If you mean like twitter/discord bots you can copy and trim their methods as they are generic. You'd need to have it manually refresh pages then spider to read for !actions until ruqqus implements socket connections or supplies feeds that your bot can refresh and read for guilds and/or threads.

body: You'd have to crawl the webpage in order to do so, as there's very little API functionality atm. It is on the roadmap however.
